body: Dude just get a sane girl like wth
So, 173155 is a better translation? Either way, this is incredible! Sticking it to all the NTR folks, haha. And @Ravenleaf is here. What a roller-coaster.
im not even jacking off anymore, im just here for the story!
I don't know why I love this series :\
Yaaaaaaaaaaaaaas, the next part is coming soon~
NTR ? this is not even NTR the last page said the girl just doing the noise to make that kid missunderstanding

@zettaizero no, it shouldn't, as she didn't cheat and there was no stealing or anything involved. She just screwed with him as "something she would do" but not actually go through with the actual act. We (the readers) have a pretty clear view on their relationship, in all previous chapters we can see she truly cares about him, but from his point of view she really keeps him guessing for the most part, so for him this is a real concern and for her it was really amusing

@Faglord "something like this" =lying to make him jealous/hurt, not actually cheat on him. As I said, the big sell point of the series is that they actually care for each other, despite how badly she treats him
Hey shouldn't we tag this as NTR? i felt something like that as i read this
@Ravenleaf "we knew she was a bitch and would do something like this" But she didn't do anything didn't she? That was little masochist's dirty mind in action.
Then again, we knew she was a bitch and would do something like this, although if she really took advantage and crushed his balls for that, she doesn't deserve any other boy toys :P

I felt that way too, was pretty upset, not cus I hate that stuff in general but because one of the biggest things about watching these two is the fact you could feel how much they legit care for each other. If he did that to her, (not just a make out doll he was being discrete with, but actually made her think he got taken by someone else) you know she'd have stabbed and/or anal raped someone
Even if it was fake, seeing her with some other dude was a total boner killer.  I felt so bad for pervert kun
